memberdef.argsstring: (MinGL &window, vector< tuple< vector< int >, vector< int >, int > > &clickablepool, int &menuid)
memberdef.name: events

param.type: vector< tuple< vector< int >, vector< int >, int > > &

briefdescription.para: Handle user input events such as mouse movement and clicks for menu navigation.

parameterdescription.para: : list of clickable areas with their coordinates and associated menu ID
menuid : current menu ID, which is updated based on user clicks
